    Extract Response Variable(s)

    getResponse.Rd

    Generic function to extract the response variable(s) from a fitted model.

    Usage

    getResponse(model, ...)

# S3 method for default
getResponse(model, ...)

    Arguments

    model

    a fitted model

    ...

    additional parameters for specific methods

    Value

    a vector or matrix containing the values of response variable(s)

    Details

    The supplied default method returns the model$y component of the model object if it exists and otherwise the result of model.response(model.frame(model)), checking in either case whether the result is numeric.

    Methods (by class)

    • getResponse(default): default method

    Examples

        fit <- lm(cbind(hp, mpg) ~ gear, mtcars)
    getResponse(fit)
#>                      hp  mpg
#> Mazda RX4           110 21.0
#> Mazda RX4 Wag       110 21.0
#> Datsun 710           93 22.8
